changes: GlucoseGuard Explainer — 'How It Works' button in Blood Sugar Tracker explains how your glucose reading controls each meal
Chef voice narration for GlucoseGuard education with full glucose-level breakdown
All pill buttons now flash so you know they're tappable
Copilot close button removed — tap Auto or touch the screen to dismiss
Clinical threshold consistency: all glucose bands aligned to 80–130 mg/dL pre-meal target
